name: Snake-Game (chakki2209)
description: This Snake game is a demonstration of my skills in utilizing external libraries and plugins. To streamline the gameplay mechanics and optimize performance, I wrote a custom plugin in C++ that manages all the movement and collision detection in real-time. This involved designing and implementing custom algorithms that are tailored to the unique requirements of the game. By utilizing this plugin, I was able to create a fun and immersive gaming experience that showcases my expertise in programming principles and game development best practices.
